research_areas.title: Computer Vision
research_areas.description: Advancing state-of-the-art in visual perception systems through deep learning and neural networks. Our research focuses on object detection, scene understanding, and video analysis for real-world applications.

research_areas.title: Explainable AI
research_areas.description: Developing transparent and interpretable AI systems that can explain their decision-making processes. We focus on making complex AI models more understandable and trustworthy for end-users.

research_areas.title: Natural Language Processing
research_areas.description: Pushing boundaries in language understanding and generation through advanced neural architectures. Our work spans across text analysis, machine translation, and conversational AI.

research_areas.title: Reinforcement Learning
research_areas.description: Investigating adaptive learning systems that can improve through interaction with their environment. We focus on developing efficient and robust RL algorithms for real-world applications.

research_areas.title: Applied AI
research_areas.description: Translating theoretical advances into practical solutions for real-world problems. We collaborate with industry partners to develop AI solutions for healthcare, robotics, and smart cities.

research_areas.title: Multi Modal Learning
research_areas.description: Advancing AI systems that can seamlessly integrate and learn from multiple types of data inputs such as text, images, audio, and video. Our research focuses on developing models that can understand and process information across different modalities, leading to more robust and human-like AI systems.
